pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate the effect of targeted biopsy (TB) with elastic fused magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and 3-dimensional transrectal ultrasound (3D-TRUS) guidance in the diagnosis of anterior prostate cancer (APCa).

metaData.source:
[QUALITY OF LIFE IN PATIENTS UNDERGOING PROSTATE CRYOABLATION]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26390559/
